captions.text: - Well, hello, everyone!

My name is Tyler Oakley,
and today, as you can tell,

I am in my pajamas, and
I'm living the dream,
because y'all recently asked,
"How do you get ready in the morning?"
And I was like, "You know what?

"That is not something I
can just plop into a Q & A,

so I figured I would show
you guys all the things

that I use to get ready and
tell you all about my, like,
getting ready in the morning process
when I first wake up.
And include you in that, so
let's do this!
So, when I first wake up, I always,
stay in bed for, like, two more hours
and just sit on my phone.

You know when you got
to sleep and you, like,

finally put away your laptop,
and then you immediately
get in bed and get on your phone?

Well, then, I do the opposite
of that when I wake up.

I get on my phone instead
of getting on my laptop,

and I just lay there on my
phone, squinting because
I don't have my glasses,
and I'm just like, I spend...
That's how I wake up.
I then jump into the shower.
And some of y'all asked me...
You guys know, if you color your hair,
do you shampoo everyday or do you, like,

condition everyday, or
do you wash your hair?
Do you even get it wet?
I usually try to keep it dry,

and with that in mind, I'm
going to show you something
so embarrassing that I got from Target.

I've needed one of these
for a long, long time,
and I was like, "What are they called?"
I can never remember what they're called.
I'm like, "A bag for your head?"
A head bag, a hair bag?

To this moment, I'm like,
"What is it called?"
It's not a hairnet.
A head bag?
I literally don't know what it's called!
A hair...
Shower cap!

I'm an idiot, let me
show you my shower cap.
This is the only one they had at Target.

So, I literally put this
on in the morning. (laughs)
Hot water gets rid of the color.
Shampoo gets rid of the color quicker.
But you still have to shampoo your hair,
because otherwise it gets grody.

So, usually, if I'm,
like, just day-to-day.

I put this on, get in
the shower, clean my body
and don't let my hair get too wet,
even though it's a little bit difficult.
But look at me right now.

I look, this is like, the
best I've ever looked.
But then if I am washing my hair that day,

I use, usually, just a shampoo
that is, like, sulfate free.

I don't really know what
sulfate is, but I've been told

by the people that you're not
supposed to use shampoo if

it's got sulfates in it,
especially if you color your hair,

because then it gets rid
of the color, I guess?
I don't really know.
And then I have different shampoos for
different colors of hair.
So I have a lilac shampoo that I use.
I have a, like, mint shampoo that I use.
I'll put all the products that I use
in the description below.

And even if I do not shower
immediately in the morning,

I learned from my good friend,
Korey, that the one thing

that you're supposed to
do, if you have to rush and
get ready in the morning.
Brush your teeth, and wash your face.
So, I use this, Morning Burst.

I have been told that
you're not supposed to use

any face wash that has, like,
the little things in it,
because it's apparently bad for the earth.
If you know that that's true, let me know,
and I will not buy this again.

But I like this, and I usually
get the grapefruit one,
because it smells delicious.

Another thing that I need when
I'm getting up in the morning
is to remind myself that today is
going to be an amazing day.
And it's up to me to make it like that.
So, just remind yourself that that is
what your destiny is gonna be,
and then it will unfold!
That's the secret.
Another thing that I absolutely need
in the morning is coffee.

And y'all always ask
me my Starbucks order.
My Starbucks order is very simple.
It is a Venti iced Red Eye

with an extra shot of espresso
with soy milk and a Splenda.
Simple.

And if I take a bath, I get
out my Zoella beauty products.
And I use the Fizz Bar, which you can get.
I would recommend it, the link is below.

Another thing that I've
been trying to do is to try
to, like, get active.

And I think, to set
your day up for success,
going on a little jog, I know that...

I mean, I personally hate
jogging, I hate running.
But when I'm done, I feel so much better.
And that kind of like sets my day up
for a really really good, productive,
healthy, active day.

Another very important part
of my day that I try to

knock out in the morning
is to whiten my teeth.
And I found a new thing.
Okay, y'all might be like, "What is this?"

And I'm gonna tell ya,
it works, so don't judge.
I got this from Colleen, who does Miranda,

and I saw her talk about
it in a favorites video
or like a Q & A or something
on her channel, a while back, months ago.

And then I finally got it
after I talked to her about it.
I was like, "Is this good?"
And she's like, "Yes, queen."
So, I got this, and basically what it is,
it's called Smile Sciences.

All you do is you take
these form-fitting trays

that are on the top of
your teeth and the bottom
of your teeth, they're like..

They fit into your teeth,
you make them like that.

And you take this like
injection sort of thing,
and trust me, I was like, "Colleen, what?"
And she's like, "It works, girl."

And so you take it, you put it
in there, and then you put it
(muffled) and this...

And then while this
tray is sitting in there
whitening your teeth, you have this...
(laughs) Just listen.

You have this light, and
it enhances the whitening.
And according to this bag that it came in,
it's made in the USA.
It gets your teeth up to 10 shades whiter.
And it's not gonna cause sensitivity.
And it's like, you can do it from home.
It's kind of, like, legit.

And I did not pay much for
this, because I used Colleen's

coupon code, and I am giving
you guys the coupon code

because y'all know, I
don't talk about something
unless I can give you guys the hook up.
So, if you would like 90 percent off.
Literally 90 percent off.

Click the link below, and
use the coupon code TYLER.
You're welcome in advance.

Other products I use in the
morning, every single morning,

I use the Kiehl's Facial
Fuel Eye De-Puffer.
I have really baggy eyes.

They are designer bags, but
they are bags nonetheless.
And I try to minimize them with this.
Basically, you just like roll it.

It's kind of like a little,
like, roll thing that you do...

I'm gonna do it right
now, why not, who cares?
And it's very cooling.
But I have a whole bunch of these.

I once was, like, "I need
to get rid of my bags,"

so I bought, like, tons
and tons of products,
trying to get rid of these.

This is my favorite one
that I've found so far.
It's Kiehl's, and I like Kiehl's.

Kielhl's! Speaking of which,
another product that I use
Kiehl's is this Forest Rain cologne.

But it's discontinued, so
if you don't have it by now,
sorry about it.
But that's part of my morning process.
Just a spritz, I spritz it.
I don't sprid it, sprid it, sprid it?
Spritz it immediately on me.
I spritz it, and then I run through it.

That is my morning process,
running through my own cologne.

Another thing that I highly
recommend in the morning
is to call somebody that you love,
and tell them that you love them.
Because maybe they need to hear it,

and maybe that's what's going
to make their day amazing.
As far as my hair goes,
everyone always asks me how I do my hair.
But I have showed you guys this before.
This is a NuMe hair dryer.
I found NuMe through my friend, Ingrid.

It's kind of amazing, you
can do cool, you can do hot.

Sometimes, if it's
really hot in the summer,

I just put it on cool,
and I blast it on myself.
That is what she said.

So yeah, sometimes, I air
dry just, like, with a towel,

if I'm not in a hurry, but if
I am in a hurry, I use this.

It gets me dry in like, literally
a minute or two minutes.

But I have really short
hair, so this is what I use.
And then as far as styling my hair,
if you guys want to see a full tutorial,
let me know in the comments below.
I can do one if you want me to,
but my hair's already styled.

Let me know in the comments
if you want a full,
from start to finish, hair tutorial.

I might do that if enough
people comment below
and push the Like button.
But as far as products go, I use, first,
the Grooming Clay from Aveda.
Then, after it's kind of styled, I use
Crew Fiber, which I have a story about.
You guys know the story.

If you know the story,
you've been here for awhile.
High hold, low shine, of course, always.

And then one other product
that I use on my face

especially is, you always
need to use a lotion.

Because your body needs,
like, lotion in your life.

So, one that I recently
got is Kiehl's, again,
this is like Kiehl's promo!
You're welcome, Kiehl's!

I guess it's called Powerful
Wrinkle Reducing Cream.
I picked this up, I really like it.
It smells, like, normal.

There's no scent, which I
like, because I don't want to,
like walk around with a big, huge
perfumey scent on my face.

But that is how I get
ready in the morning!

I know it's not very exciting,
but somebody asked me.
And I was like, "I wanna do a how I
"get ready in the morning."

So, if you like this video,
and if you want a full

hair tutorial, all you got
to do is give a thumbs up,
and let me know in the comments below.
And what is one thing you need
to do to get ready in the morning?
Let me know, put it in the comments.
So, that is all I have for you guys today.

If you like this video, and
you want to see a full tutorial
on how I do my hair.

Like a full, from
getting out of the shower

to getting my hair done,
click the Like button.

If enough of you click the Like
button, then I might do it.

If you want to see my latest
video, click right there.

If you want to hear my latest
podcast, click right there.
It's really funny this week.
You want to listen to that.

And go like the Psycho
Babble Facebook page
while you're at it.

And if you want to be
my person of the week,
click right there, get something cute,

and send me a picture on
Twitter of you being cute
in a shirt or something.
And you might be there in my next video.

But yeah, that is all I
have for you guys this week.
I hope you have a fabulous life,
and I will see you guys next time.
Later!
(ukelele music)
(muffled) I just caught some...
(laughs)

Sometimes I just try to,
like, talk with these in,

'cause it makes me feel like,
I'm on a football field,
and I'm like, "Hey y'all...
"We're gonna..." (laughs)
"We're gonna go long this time."

title: 10 Things I Do When I Wake Up | Tyler Oakley
